reviewText:
Finally, a nude yoga DVD that gets it right- a perfectly sweet looking blonde yogini who really knows her yoga. (All the other nude yoga videos I've bought featured second rate yoga skills done by stripper types.) But this yoga model is a wholesome, corn fed, blue eyed beauty... and is very talented and very flexible. I usually watch it in the morning to get me up and stretching. I like the way she starts out with some sun salutations, with just the right pacing to make it easy to follow along. And then her poses get progressively more advanced. The nudity is tasteful and inspiring. And hot. I love it.

Even my picky roommate who has been doing yoga for years likes it, and uses it to relax. The scenery is gorgeous- an ocean setting and a sunny shoreline backdrop. And none of that hokey yoga instructional narration stuff telling you to breathe etc... Just some hip music, and some soothing wave sounds. The production quality is very high quality, and well made. I've been waiting for a yoga video like this- finally a natural and naked beauty, who is also good at yoga.
again i guess i shoud check out the star rateings before i rent this kind of movie I am not the only one that did care for it.
I was not a fan of this video not what i thought it would be hot girl not enough action

I love yoga now that I am getting older and find it better for my body than hard workouts. Seeing it done in the nude brings a different dimension to it. My own yoga personal trainer wears almost nothing (usually jog-bra and bikini bottom) so this is closer to my real life.

Watching this video is really fun, but go easy and take it slow if you attempt to hold some of the yoga positions she assumes, because holding them as long as she does can cause some real pain. As for me. I wouldn't even try, but I do like to stand naked in the sun.
I found this move interesting and education in learning and practicing yoga. It felt it was a quality production and I would recommend it

Dane van Rose is doing something better than I have seen it done anywhere else - capturing the beauty of the physical form and presenting it with the added context of a good workout.  The video keeps me tuned in and participating.  The music is well constructed and matched in with the visual aspects.

This product delivers what it says; however, Ocean Goddess video is probably the best in the series, followed by Zen Garden Goddess as far as ease of following along and production.  Worship the Sun is probably the least effective and clear in its delivery. The yoga moves are seem to last forever, and the transitions are not as clear as in the previously mentioned DVDs.  Delivery and shipping were as expected!
Good background music but needed better closeup video and too much shot of the ocean distracted from actual subject, may reent again
Camera angles were terible and hole thing was slow and Boring compared to other nude yoga. I wouldn't waste the time to download it.

The girl is young. She is cute. She is nude.  She does yoga in a rocky area next to what appears to be the ocean or a large lake. The camera work is pretty good. For some reason the camera on these two videos likes to shoot facing the sun so the model is often in her own shade. This video is better than the zen garden one by a long shot if you just want to watch, (and see what you are looking at). Even so, there are still a lot of silhouette shots because of the camera angle.
There is no verbal cuing, but the name of the asana is flashed on the screen as the model goes into the pose.
Just caught my attention and it is just as it says, a nude woman doing yoga! Only checked it out for a few minutes before putting me to sleep.
Thought I would see something learn something and be mildly awakened. None of these things happened. Yoga is bad the naked woman is awful.

I RENTED ANOTHER NUDE YOGA WITH ANOTHER MORE SKIN TONED WOMAN FROM ANOTHER COUNTRY I ASSUME AND THE PHOTOGRAPHERS WERE MORE UP CLOSE AND PERSONAL IN VIEWING NOT JUST THE VAGINA AREA BUT THE WHOLE BODY AND YOGA PERFORMANCE!

THIS ONE SUCKED ROCKS,IT WAS PREJUDICE LIKE WHITE WOMEN ARE TOO GOOD TO SHOW THE VAGINA AREA UP CLOSE!
Not really the most instructional video, but the young girl does a fine job demonstrating the poses.  I would have liked some closeups between the legs, though.
If you like naked ladies I think you would like this. Its a hot girl doing naked yoga with some peaceful music. Its a good way to unwind.

My husband watched this after I had gone to bed he is a sucker for these things and he always regrets them in the morning he said it was a waste of money and he fell asleep during it anyway so Iam thinking it was a very good Yoga video and not at all what he was hoping for (smothers a laugh)
I saw the five star rating but was dissapointed, blaa blaa blaa boring. If you listen to the sounds of the ocean in alternative audio mode with your eyes closed this dvd is for you.

horrible they randomly zoom on a shoulder or show water for 40 seconds straight you cant learn and even watching if your a guy you don't see ass or her vagina at all DOING NUDE YOGA how is that even possible, it repeats the same stuff for the first 25 minutes you learn in a basic class but instead of seeing it they have random poems pop up that make no sense for the video
one point they zoom on her face then her feet then when they go to show you the pose she changes what is the point of this video girls and guys cant do yoga to it and guys if your attracted to her you won't get help from this video
This is a nice video with good illustrations. The images are clear and the model presented the exercises well enough to follow.

I didn't think they would have anything like this. I wanted to start to learn Yoga & Pilates, and felt I needed some inspiration to start. This was Good an Visually Enjoyable on watching the Poses of Yoga/Pilates }:cD had some nice close-ups and very enjoyed the contours of this person and definately see the benefit too...

I recommend }:cD

They were very poor contents.
It is like [ which is wanted to retake ].
The semantic model who is these contents is pitiful.

The only good part of this entire movie was the model seemed happy.  Besides that the photography was so horrible that it was like watching a silhouette with the bright background.  The location was so cramped it was obviously difficult on the cameraman.  The motions were cramped I'm assuming because of the location.  Watching this video was like watching a 1970's documentary.  I wish I had not spent a dime on this.

[This is a comparison of the two, so I'm reprinting it from the "Zen Garden Goddess" site.]
I'm the only person I know who has a yoga-related injury - a knee weakened by having to sit on my heels for an hour every morning and evening for the few months I was enrolled at a yoga-schram. Eventually I had to have arthroscopic surgery to trim my torn meniscus, and this experience turned me off yoga.
My interest in these videos is therefore entirely aesthetic and erotic, and it's a toss-up as to which of the two young yoginis is more lovely. The blonde in the first video is very young - possibly still in her late teens - and she smiles joyously. The brunette is a bit older - mid-twenties I'd guess. Her smile seems forced and she does not appear to have emptied her mind as completely as the blonde. Neither woman seems uncomfortable at being mother-naked, and both have taken pains to look their best, with painted nails, shaved armpits and carefully trimmed (or waxed?) body hair, umbilical piercings, and tasteful abstract tattoos.
The main difference between the two videos is in the explicitness of the camera-work. The first video, with the blonde, is so discrete that students of yoga could find themselves handicapped, and for the voyeurs among us this hiatus is frustrating. The second video abandoned this caution, leading to a franker exposure of the brunette, whom we get in full-frontal camera angles, with no attempt to hide or avoid what the French call "la chatte." Such directness helps us see her as a whole human being. This seems to me a healthy attitude, and one in keeping with the philosophy of yoga, which sees sex as nothing to be ashamed of.
There is a Hindu holy book, the KAMA SUTRA, that is a how-to guide to yogic lovemaking. It would be fascinating to watch a video of a couple practicing yogic sex. One particularly fascinating practice - which I would love to see - is the male yogi's reputed ability to reclaim his seed by reversing the process by which it was expelled. I wonder if this seeming physiological impossibility can actually happen. Does anyone know whether a video of a yogi and yogini making love is available, and if so, where?

Don't bother with this one.  As others have noted, the video quality is quite poor.  What bothered me even more is that the yoga is not very good.  There is something remarkably beautiful about the strength and grace of the human form that has been shaped and refined through the practice of yoga, but this is not it.  You can tell by the model's body and by the misalignment in her yoga postures that she has not been practicing yoga very long.  Her yoga form is advanced-beginner at best.  Nothing wrong with being an advanced beginner -- we all have to start somewhere -- but it is definitely not something to make a video about and charge money for. For what it's worth, the producer has a similar video entitled Zen Garden Goddess which is much better done.  You can tell the model in that one is a yoga practitioner, both in terms of the tone in her body and the alignment of her postures. Strange that the same video company would produce two videos of such disparate quality.  Wish there was a way to get a refund on this one.

The overall production of this video is completely amateur.  They used a cheap camera and the camera work is poor.  It looks to me like some people who like yoga got together with a home video camera and shot this video and then edited it in Microsoft Movie Maker.  Not professional at all.  The yoga is ok, but no explanation or teaching happening, just a naked girl doing yoga.  Tasteful as it may be, it does not celebrate the human body, or yoga.  Totally lame.

Very disappointed. Thought it would be about Yoga. No how to at all. Naked girl doesn't speak at all. Just a few movements on her part, surrounded by empty junk. Other reviews were staged. It's probably not what you think it is. Can't imagine why anyone would rent it.

I downloaded this and was so pleasantly surprised by how good it was I bought the DVD for a friend as well. The visuals and music are lush, sumptuous' and sensual. I practice yoga along with the video, but also sometimes just play it for a pleasant and relaxing ambiance. Amazing production values - I wish there was more stuff like this available.

I was pleasantly surprised by how good this video is. The visuals and music are lush, sumptuous' and sensual. I practice yoga along with the video, but also sometimes just play it for a pleasant and relaxing ambiance. Amazing production values - I wish there was more stuff like this available.

I can't speak to the yoga value.  I purchased this DVD as a screen saver for the TV.  As a screen saver it serves it's purpose,  However if you are considering it for the "Pure Nude" part you will be disappointed.  Some T, a little A, NOTHING else.

This is a very beautiful video, the woman doing the poses is amazingly beautiful she not only shows the beauty of the human body with out any sexual implications she displays the yoga poses very well.  The scenery is also beautiful as is the minimal special effects used from changing from one pose to the next.  It is a first class production all the way, great job
Exceeded my expectation.  Nice item!
tastefully done,
gorgeous females showing off those beautiful bodies in the sun.
It's okay
IT WAS OK
very relaxing,soothing,relaxing  background audio.
You get nothing out of this, defiantly no yoga instruction. As for anything else, it might as well be called topless yoga cause that's all your gonna see
Beautiful girl, relaxing music, and calming Yoga. More spiritual than sexual, a well done film that leaves you peaceful and vividly aware of human grace.
watching this was relaxing and enjoyable. a way to practice and learn to bend the body. they actually knew yoga.

The video showed most of the nudity expressed by the subject but there were no views of her delicate flower between her fine legs.  This compared poorly with the excellent coverage in Ocean Goddess and Zen Goddess.
